title: PDF Studio: PDF Editor
description: PDF Studio is a web application designed to simplify the process of creating, editing, and managing PDF documents. The application provides a user-friendly interface that allows users to easily create, edit, and customize their PDF documents with a variety of templates, themes, and design elements. PDF Studio also includes features such as drag-and-drop functionality, real-time collaboration, and integration with popular cloud storage services for seamless access and sharing of PDF documents.
tech: Canvas API for PDF rendering and editing
Cloud Storage APIs (e.g., Google Drive, Dropbox) for file management and sharing
